author: tiwariPC
body:
DeepNNTagInfoProducer.cc has been templated to work for pf as well as calo jets. Required config files in python directory were added. We compared "caloJets TemplatedDeepCSV vs pfJets RECO" and  "pfJets TemplatedDeepCSV vs pfJets RECO". 

Validation plots can be found in the following link: 
https://ptiwari.web.cern.ch/ptiwari/btvHLT/validation

More details can be found in slide 6 of Dinko's presentation in Reco meeting:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/632452/contributions/2557810/attachments/1446482/2231048/BTV_status_plans_91X.pdf
title: Templated DeepNNTagInfoProducer
